title: Support and Resistance Levels
description: Master the art of identifying and using support and resistance levels in your trading strategy. These are critical price levels where buying and selling pressure concentrates.
content:
In this lesson, you'll understand:

• What support and resistance are
• How to draw support and resistance lines
• The difference between hard and soft levels
• How institutions use these levels
• Practical examples on real charts

quiz.question: What is support in technical analysis?
options: A price level where selling pressure emerges
A price level where buying pressure emerges and prevents further decline
The highest price reached by an asset
A moving average that supports the price
quiz.explanation: Support is a price level where buying pressure emerges, preventing the price from falling further. This is where buyers step in and support the price.
